snippet.textDisplay: The USA and some of the western countries SUCKS!
snippet.textOriginal: The USA and some of the western countries SUCKS!

snippet.textDisplay:
Over the past one and a half decade I have seen the worst sides of the Western countries, particularly the US. Through my past official dealing with the US law enforcement and intelligence agencies, I really feel lucky not being an American. I cannot help but to conclude that the US is nothing but a giant factory of lies and the most dictatorship-styled country. Beside being a fake democracy with questionable human rights, The US is also an arrogant warlord.

Look at the racial discrimination between the whites and other non whites, where is the real equal rights?

The politicians are even given the legal green lights to accept bribes from interest groups or lobbyists in the name of political donations.

Some may have forgotten that the US lied to the world that Saddam Hussain had several arsenal of weapons of mass destruction hidden in Iraq to justify its invasion into Iraq. BUT, in the end, there was no evidence of such claims to be found!

Above are just some glimpses of evil things that were done by the US.

Recent years, I see that lots of western medias started to deviate from reporting facts to writing fictions. These rogue medias claim to monitor the governments. However, who monitor them? Is there any way to bring these rogue medias to court for defaming a country, an organization or an individual?

snippet.textDisplay:
Is CPC lying or Western MSM lying has become the topic of debate on every China related subject lately. The Winter Olympics are claimed to be 100% green according to China's organisers and IOC. The western media has been discrediting mainly this because of use of artificial snow and risk of erosion. China has responded with many counter claims. Here is two example https://www.chinadaily.com.cn/a/202201/20/WS61e922d4a310cdd39bc82501.html
http://www.chinadaily.com.cn/a/202201/18/WS61e61625a310cdd39bc81a22.html
I assume many will say that China Daily is a mouthpiece of CPC. But why not read the article anyway? It is not because Chinese media is government funded that the content can not reveal information that can be useful to make a more complete judgement. Otherwise, it is one word against the other, and this comes down again to whether we trust China on its word or not. I wrote a book about that topic. My point is, that if we accept that the games are 100% green as China and ICO claims, then we can use China as a reference for future games and learn from them. If we claim the games are not green at all, then there will be no incentive to make an effort next time in Italy in 2026. Our trust in China will define our intensions for the future to save the planet. I trust the Beijing games are green, because I recognise that China has the renewable energy capacity to make 100% green games and are planting millions of trees to make up for the CO2. I believe the western media is correct to point out that artificial snow is not ecological, but it is not helpful to attack China as their efforts to make the games green are real.

China's Winter Olympics is going to inspire a lot of Winter Sports following in the world's most populous country with the highest mountains and most mountains. This is a huge opportunity for development of Sports in general.
The apparent controversies are a great attraction for the world to pay attention to real sportsmanship.
